attributes.action: petition to relocate Israel somewhere in the desert in the United States
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price in blood worldwide for the existence of the state of Israel, and all the terrorism that is created by Arab conspiracy theories just isn't worth it. Why not make all our lives easier and just relocate Israel to somewhere in the desert in the United States then Islamic extremist groups will have lost their biggest reason to blow themselves up in the name of Allah.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
